SurrogateMother_Lair.synopsis: This occurs after the hag fight. Mayrina is in one of two states. In the top she is horrified, shaken and trying to calm herself. She can't believe she almost made a deal with the hag and explains her deal to the player.In the second, she is FURIOUS with the player for ruining her deal. And leaves angry with them (unless you tell her about ethel planning to eat her child.)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The session 'SurrogateMother_Lair' is explicitly stated to occur after the hag fight. This indicates an ordering constraint where the hag fight must be completed before triggering 'SurrogateMother_Lair'. There are no indications of other sessions that conflict or cannot coexist with 'SurrogateMother_Lair', hence no exclusiveness rules are apparent.

SurrogateMother_Lair_11.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_11.text: You bastard! You ruined it - you ruined everything!
SurrogateMother_Lair_11.context: NodeContext: You are SPITTING angry - the player has ruined your deal with ethel - you will NEVER see your husband again now

SurrogateMother_Lair_25.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_25.text: First my brothers and now my husband? What more do you want?

SurrogateMother_Lair_102.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_102.text: Slow down - what did I do?

SurrogateMother_Lair_67.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_67.text: I'm sorry. I was trying to help.

SurrogateMother_Lair_97.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_97.context: NodeContext: Utterly furious that the player has the GALL to apologise

SurrogateMother_Lair_35.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_35.text: This is an interesting way of thanking me.

SurrogateMother_Lair_89.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_89.text: You want thanks? A slap is all you deserve.
SurrogateMother_Lair_89.context: NodeContext: Utterly furious that the player has the GALL to expect thanks

SurrogateMother_Lair_118.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_118.text: Ethel was going to bring my husband back. Back from the dead! And now I'll never see him again - because of you.
SurrogateMother_Lair_118.context: NodeContext: Your anger isn't as explosive as you've settled into a quiet rage but you are still FURIOUS at the player for interfering

SurrogateMother_Lair_18.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_18.text: Because of Auntie Ethel. You nearly died!

SurrogateMother_Lair_32.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_32.text: I was fine. She wouldn't have killed me - I had something she wanted.
SurrogateMother_Lair_32.context: NodeContext: "something she wanted": Mayrina places hands on pregnant stomach

SurrogateMother_Lair_111.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_111.text: Just a bit longer and my child would have been born. And all this - all this would have been over.
SurrogateMother_Lair_111.context: NodeContext: Your voice breaks a bit at the end here. You were in a lot of pain with the hag and suffering, your wall is crumbling a touch

SurrogateMother_Lair_16.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_16.text: You were going to trade your baby for your dead husband?

SurrogateMother_Lair_31.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_31.text: Don't judge me. I have nothing. My baby would have been raised in rags.
SurrogateMother_Lair_31.context: NodeContext: Cold fury - the player is getting on your nerves

SurrogateMother_Lair_22.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_22.text: Auntie Ethel promised to give this child a good life - teach them magic, even!
SurrogateMother_Lair_22.context: NodeContext: All you wanted was your child happy and your husband home.

SurrogateMother_Lair_66.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_66.text: More than I could have done...
SurrogateMother_Lair_66.context: NodeContext: You feel like a 'bad mother' -something ethel repeated to you over and over

SurrogateMother_Lair_114.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_114.text: Is that what Ethel told you?

SurrogateMother_Lair_45.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_45.text: She said I'd make a bad mother. I... I think she was right.
SurrogateMother_Lair_45.context: NodeContext: close to tears, player has hit the nail on the head,

SurrogateMother_Lair_72.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_72.text: Don't sell yourself short. You can raise this child.

SurrogateMother_Lair_37.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_37.text: I always wanted to be a mother. I... just never thought I'd do it alone.
SurrogateMother_Lair_37.context: NodeContext: Miserable as the reality of your situation sinks in

SurrogateMother_Lair_108.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_108.text: From what I've seen, you'd make a terrible mother.

SurrogateMother_Lair_9.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_9.text: I... I think you're right. That's what Ethel always told me.
SurrogateMother_Lair_9.context: NodeContext: close to tears, player has hit the nail on the head,

SurrogateMother_Lair_112.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_112.text: Now I'll have to drag Connor's coffin all the way home. It's the only way this child will ever meet their father.

SurrogateMother_Lair_12.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_12.text: You should have known better - hags don't help anyone but themselves.

SurrogateMother_Lair_107.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_107.text: Well, I didn't bloody ask you, did I? I didn't ask for any of this! I just wanted Connor back.
SurrogateMother_Lair_107.context: NodeContext: You feel like the player isn't listening to you and is just judging you like everyone else - when all you're trying to do is the best you can

SurrogateMother_Lair_70.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_70.text: With hags, nothing is ever over.

SurrogateMother_Lair_119.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_119.text: This was the best chance I had - for me and my baby.

SurrogateMother_Lair_50.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_50.text: A life for a life - you must really love your husband.

SurrogateMother_Lair_76.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_76.context: NodeContext: Hands on stomach - love and sadness at the mention of both

SurrogateMother_Lair_59.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_59.text: Don't be naive - a hag was never going to help you.

SurrogateMother_Lair_54.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_54.text: She would've! I had everything figured out.
SurrogateMother_Lair_54.context: NodeContext: "everything figured out": Mayrina places hands on pregnant stomach

SurrogateMother_Lair_10.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_10.text: Hags don't work for free. What did you promise her?

SurrogateMother_Lair_81.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_81.context: NodeContext: Mayrina places hands on pregnant stomach

SurrogateMother_Lair_80.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_80.text: No, I'm not! Why ruin my deal when I was so close?
SurrogateMother_Lair_80.context: NodeContext: "so close": Mayrina places hands on pregnant stomach

SurrogateMother_Lair_53.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_53.text: Auntie Ethel planned to eat your child.

SurrogateMother_Lair_91.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_91.text: What? But she promised to look after them! Teach them magic!
SurrogateMother_Lair_91.context: NodeContext: Player has revealed that ethel planned to eat your child. Gut wrenching shock and horror

SurrogateMother_Lair_82.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_82.text: I'm sorry - she lied to you.

SurrogateMother_Lair_68.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_68.text: I mean - turning a child into a hag does involve teaching them magic...

SurrogateMother_Lair_8.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_8.text: You're an idiot for believing that.

SurrogateMother_Lair_100.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_100.text: ... I'm so stupid. So bloody stupid.
SurrogateMother_Lair_100.context: NodeContext: Immediately turning to blame yourself. Feeling like you can't do anything right.

SurrogateMother_Lair_41.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_41.text: No, you were desperate. And she took advantage of that.

SurrogateMother_Lair_78.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_78.text: I thought I could fix it. Give my child a good home and bring my husband back - all in one go.
SurrogateMother_Lair_78.context: NodeContext: Getting upset as you tell your story, thinking of how close you were to getting the love of your life back

SurrogateMother_Lair_40.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_40.text: I'm sorry. You've been through a lot.

SurrogateMother_Lair_47.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_47.text: People always say that. It doesn't mean anything.
SurrogateMother_Lair_47.context: NodeContext: The grief filled determination of someone who has seen too much

SurrogateMother_Lair_104.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_104.text: I'm done. With you, with this place. After everything I went through to get Connor back.
SurrogateMother_Lair_104.context: NodeContext: Angry and upset - tears can't be held back anymore

SurrogateMother_Lair_116.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_116.text: Now I have to drag his corpse back home, coffin and all, because a goddamn grave is the closest I'll get to seeing him again.

SurrogateMother_Lair_5.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_5.context: NodeContext: Your parting words to the player - you're bitter and angry with them. To you, they took away the last chance you have of ever seeing your husband.

SurrogateMother_Lair_109.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_109.text: Look, I - I don't have much...
SurrogateMother_Lair_109.context: NodeContext: You're getting upset, about to give a locket to the player - it's all you have left of your husband - because you feel you owe them.

SurrogateMother_Lair_55.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_55.text: ...but take this locket. It's worth a bit. Now we're even.
SurrogateMother_Lair_55.context: NodeContext: Fighting back tears as you try to act businesslike but failing.

SurrogateMother_Lair_38.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_38.text: Not much indeed. Got nothing else?

SurrogateMother_Lair_64.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_64.text: It's this or the clothes off my back - and I'm not walking out of here starkers. You want it or not?
SurrogateMother_Lair_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still holding out locket.NodeContext: A note of steel in your voice - this locket means everything to you. Still holding out locket.

SurrogateMother_Lair_93.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_93.text: Keep it. You don't owe me anything.

SurrogateMother_Lair_61.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Clutches locket close, then pockets it.NodeContext: At end of line, clutch locket close to your chest then pocket it. You're surprised but delighted. The locket was made for you by your husband - it's all you have.

SurrogateMother_Lair_56.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_56.text: Just look after it, all right?
SurrogateMother_Lair_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player pockets locket.NodeContext: Look away - trying to keep the grief at losing the necklace out of your voice.

SurrogateMother_Lair_2.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_2.text: My husband gave it to me. I should take him home.
SurrogateMother_Lair_2.context: NodeContext: beat between sentences, sadness as you think of your husband but steeling yourself for what comes next

SurrogateMother_Lair_7.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_7.text: His coffin is just upstairs. A decent burial is the least I can give him.
SurrogateMother_Lair_7.context: NodeContext: Your voice almost breaks but you're holding it together.

SurrogateMother_Lair_0.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_0.text: Thank you. I don't think there's anyone else who would've saved me.
SurrogateMother_Lair_0.context: NodeContext: Sad but truly grateful. Sound a little hesitant - you don't think you deserved saving

SurrogateMother_Lair_48.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_48.text: Now is the time to focus on your child.

SurrogateMother_Lair_28.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_28.text: You think my baby ever left my mind? Not even at my lowest.
SurrogateMother_Lair_28.context: NodeContext: The grief filled determination of someone who has seen too much

SurrogateMother_Lair_113.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_113.text: It was obviously too good to be true.

SurrogateMother_Lair_33.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_33.context: NodeContext: The grief filled determination of someone who has seen too much

SurrogateMother_Lair_62.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_62.text: I don't need this. Good luck getting out of here on your own.

SurrogateMother_Lair_20.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_20.text: Go on. Walk away. And wave to my husband's rotting corpse on your way out.

SurrogateMother_Lair_27.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_27.text: That's right - he's buried outside. And I was this close to getting him back.

SurrogateMother_Lair_79.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_79.text: Thanks to you, I'll never see him again.

SurrogateMother_Lair_13.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_13.text: I'm so stupid. How could I have trusted her?
SurrogateMother_Lair_13.context: NodeContext: Shake and horrified - you've just survived a near death experience.

SurrogateMother_Lair_21.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_21.text: I almost gave that monster my child.
SurrogateMother_Lair_21.context: NodeContext: The true horror of what you almost did is dawning on you - giving your child to a hag.

SurrogateMother_Lair_30.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_30.text: Why the hells would you even consider that?

SurrogateMother_Lair_106.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_106.text: That's what she wanted - my baby. And, gods, I was going to do it - for him.
SurrogateMother_Lair_106.context: NodeContext: Horror and grief as you recount your deal

SurrogateMother_Lair_77.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_77.text: It was part of the deal. For him.
SurrogateMother_Lair_77.context: NodeContext: Horror and grief as you recount your deal

SurrogateMother_Lair_19.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_19.text: My husband. She was going to bring him back. Bring Connor back to life.

SurrogateMother_Lair_94.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_94.text: Your husband must have meant a great deal to you.

SurrogateMother_Lair_71.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_71.text: Connor would have done anything to save me - I had to do the same.

SurrogateMother_Lair_73.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_73.text: I just wanted everything back - back the way it was.
SurrogateMother_Lair_73.context: NodeContext: Crying, covering your face in your hands - you hate crying in front of others but this is you at your lowest

SurrogateMother_Lair_14.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_14.text: Ethel saw you were vulnerable. She took advantage.

SurrogateMother_Lair_36.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_36.text: It's my own fault for letting her.

SurrogateMother_Lair_15.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_15.text: That doesn't excuse the deal you made.

SurrogateMother_Lair_96.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_96.text: I never said it did! I just wanted you to understand.

SurrogateMother_Lair_88.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_88.text: I imagine Ethel thinks the same.
SurrogateMother_Lair_88.context: NodeContext: Not meeting the player's eye, thinking of all the harsh things you endured under Ethel

SurrogateMother_Lair_43.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_43.text: I imagine Ethel would've said the same.
SurrogateMother_Lair_43.context: NodeContext: Not meeting the player's eye, thinking of all the harsh things you endured under Ethel

SurrogateMother_Lair_52.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_52.text: She always told me I was worthless.
SurrogateMother_Lair_52.context: NodeContext: Not meeting the player's eye, thinking of all the harsh things you endured under Ethel

SurrogateMother_Lair_44.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_44.text: Look - I don't like owing people.
SurrogateMother_Lair_44.context: NodeContext: Dejected but pulling yourself together. You're a fighter, and you'll keep on fighting

SurrogateMother_Lair_115.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_115.text: Here. This locket is worth some coin.
SurrogateMother_Lair_115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Produces a small gold locket held in her palm and holds it out to the player.NodeContext: Greving  but determined - Produces a small gold locket held in her palm and holds it out to the player.

SurrogateMother_Lair_4.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_4.text: What would have happened to your child?

SurrogateMother_Lair_110.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_110.text: Ethel promised to raise the child - teach them magic. Give them a good life. That's a damn sight better than I can do.
SurrogateMother_Lair_110.context: NodeContext: You made this deal with child in mind. You will NOT be judged for wanting your child to have a better life.

SurrogateMother_Lair_75.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_75.text: You'd have sacrificed a new life for a lost life? Pure selfishness.

SurrogateMother_Lair_95.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_95.context: NodeContext: Getting defensive and angry - you will not be judged by someone

SurrogateMother_Lair_84.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_84.text: Let me know when you're done whining.

SurrogateMother_Lair_98.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_98.text: I'm more the fool for getting upset. It's likely gold you want, right?
SurrogateMother_Lair_98.context: NodeContext: Resigned, bitter - you're feeling lost and alone

SurrogateMother_Lair_17.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_17.context: NodeContext: Struggling to pull yourself together - but managing. If the player doesn't want to hear about how upset you are, you have too much pride to continue talking about the child/deal.

SurrogateMother_Lair_65.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_65.text: Ethel's gone, isn't she? I felt it.
SurrogateMother_Lair_65.context: NodeContext: Scared and horrified - the reality of what almost happened sinking in.

SurrogateMother_Lair_60.speaker: Player
SurrogateMother_Lair_60.text: Yes. She's left this place for good.

SurrogateMother_Lair_92.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_92.text: I can't believe I was so stupid.
SurrogateMother_Lair_92.context: NodeContext: Shake and horrified - you've just survived a near death experience.

SurrogateMother_Lair_24.speaker: Mayrina
SurrogateMother_Lair_24.text: Awake or asleep I could hear her. Laughing at me. Taunting me. Now it's gone.
